016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.Map.Entry;
021import static java.util.Map.entry;
022
023/**
024 * An adduct, generally, consists of a sum formula part, an adduct string, the
025 * charge and the charge sign. An example for a valid adduct is : [M+H]1+.
026 *
027 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
028 * @author Nils Hoffmann
029 */
030public final class Adduct {
031
032    private String sumFormula;
033    private String adductString;
034    private int charge;
035    private int chargeSign;
036    private ElementTable heavyElements = new ElementTable();
037
038    public static final Map<String, ElementTable> ADDUCTS = Map.ofEntries(
039            entry("+H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 1))),
040            entry("+2H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 2))),
041            entry("+3H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 3))),
042            entry("+4H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 4))),
043            entry("-H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -1))),
044            entry("-2H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -2))),
045            entry("-3H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -3))),
046            entry("-4H", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -4))),
047            entry("+H-H2O", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, -1), Map.entry(Element.O, -1))),
048            entry("+NH4", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.N, 1), Map.entry(Element.H, 4))),
049            entry("+Cl", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.Cl, 1))),
050            entry("+HCOO", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 1), Map.entry(Element.C, 1), Map.entry(Element.O, 2))),
051            entry("+CH3COO", ElementTable.of(Map.entry(Element.H, 3), Map.entry(Element.C, 2), Map.entry(Element.O, 2)))
052    );
053
054    public static final Map<String, Integer> ADDUCT_CHARGES = Map.ofEntries(
055            entry("+H", 1),
056            entry("+2H", 2),
057            entry("+3H", 3),
058            entry("+4H", 4),
059            entry("-H", -1),
060            entry("-2H", -2),
061            entry("-3H", -3),
062            entry("-4H", -4),
063            entry("+H-H2O", 1),
064            entry("+NH4", 1),
065            entry("+Cl", -1),
066            entry("+HCOO", -1),
067            entry("+CH3COO", -1)
068    );
069
070    public Adduct(String _sum_formula, String _adduct_string) {
071        this(_sum_formula, _adduct_string, 0, 1);
072
073    }
074
075    public Adduct(String _sum_formula, String _adduct_string, int _charge, int _sign) {
076        sumFormula = _sum_formula;
077        adductString = _adduct_string;
078        charge = _charge;
079        setChargeSign(_sign);
080    }
081
082    public void setSumFormula(String sumFormula) {
083        this.sumFormula = sumFormula;
084    }
085
086    public String getSumFormula() {
087        return this.sumFormula;
088    }
089
090    public void setAdductString(String adductString) {
091        this.adductString = adductString;
092    }
093
094    public String getAdductString() {
095        return this.adductString;
096    }
097    
098    public ElementTable getHeavyElements(){
099        return heavyElements;
100    }
101
102    public void setChargeSign(int _sign) {
103        if (-1 <= _sign && _sign <= 1) {
104            chargeSign = _sign;
105        } else {
106            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Sign can only be -1, 0, or 1");
107        }
108    }
109
110    public int getChargeSign() {
111        return this.chargeSign;
112    }
113
114    public void setCharge(int charge) {
115        if (charge > 0) {
116            this.chargeSign = 1;
117        } else {
118            this.chargeSign = -1;
119        }
120        this.charge = charge;
121    }
122    
123    
124    public String getHeavyIsotopeString(){
125        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
126        for (Element e : Elements.ELEMENT_ORDER) {
127            if (heavyElements.get(e) > 0){
128                if (heavyElements.get(e) == 1) sb.append(Elements.HEAVY_SHORTCUT.get(e));
129                else sb.append(Elements.HEAVY_SHORTCUT.get(e)).append(heavyElements.get(e));
130            }
131        }
132        return sb.toString();
133    }
134    
135
136    public String getLipidString() {
137        if (charge == 0) {
138            return "[M" +getHeavyIsotopeString() + "]";
139        }
140        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
141        sb.append("[M").append(getHeavyIsotopeString()).append(sumFormula).append(adductString).append("]").append(charge).append(((chargeSign > 0) ? "+" : "-"));
142
143        return sb.toString();
144    }
145
146    @JsonIgnore
147    public ElementTable getElements() {
148        ElementTable elements = new ElementTable();
149        
150        for (Entry<Element, Integer> kv : heavyElements.entrySet()){
151            if (kv.getValue() > 0){
152                Element regular = Elements.HEAVY_TO_REGULAR.get(kv.getKey());
153                elements.put(regular, elements.get(regular) - kv.getValue());
154                elements.put(kv.getKey(), elements.get(kv.getKey()) + kv.getValue());
155            }
156        }
157        
158        if (adductString.length() > 0){
159            if (ADDUCTS.containsKey(adductString)) {
160                if (ADDUCT_CHARGES.get(adductString) != getCharge()) {
161                    throw new ConstraintViolationException("Provided charge '" + getCharge() + "' in contradiction to adduct '" + adductString + "' charge '" + ADDUCT_CHARGES.get(adductString) + "'.");
162                }
163                elements.add(ADDUCTS.get(adductString));
164            } else {
165                throw new ConstraintViolationException("Adduct '" + adductString + "' is unknown.");
166            }
167        }
168
169        return elements;
170    }
171
172    /**
173     * Returns the positive elementary charge times the charge sign.
174     *
175     * @return the net charge.
176     */
177    public int getCharge() {
178        return charge * chargeSign;
179    }
180}
